description: This file defines the 'Token' class representing a game token or pawn in a Ludo game, including fields for owner, position, and index, along with constructors, getters, and setters.

classes.name: Token
classes.description: Represents a single game token/pawn associated with a Player, including its position and identity within the game.

methods.name: Token()
methods.description: Default constructor for the Token class.

methods.name: Token(Player, int, String)
methods.description: Parameterized constructor to create a Token with specified owner, index, and position.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the token.

methods.name: getPlayer
methods.description: Returns the Player who owns this token.

methods.name: setPlayer
methods.description: Sets the Player who owns this token and returns the Token object.

methods.name: getTokenIndex
methods.description: Returns the index (0..3) of the token for its player.

methods.name: setTokenIndex
methods.description: Sets the token index and returns the Token object.

methods.name: getPosition
methods.description: Returns the position descriptor of the token.

methods.name: setPosition
methods.description: Sets the position descriptor of the token.
